abstract: HSBC joins Barclays of Britain and Banco Santander of Spain in either closing retail branches in Russia or scaling back plans to open them.
snippet: HSBC joins Barclays of Britain and Banco Santander of Spain in either closing retail branches in Russia or scaling back plans to open them.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — HSBC on Monday became the latest foreign bank to pull out of retail banking in Russia as large state-owned banks have come to dominate a business that had been expected to provide a rich growth opportunity for foreign institutions.

headline.main: HSBC Drops Out of Retail Banking in Russia
